constituent: concentrated, water, water droplets, water pistol, agriculture, bend, sign of the dragon, cliff, two, hairpin, safety-pin
heisigStory: Among other things, the key word refers to the thick consistency of liquids. Its elements: water . . . agriculture.
koohiiStory1: The agriculture of Florida is concentrated on making concentrated orange juice. Just add water! Imagine a can of FCOJ, dumping it into a pitcher and adding water.
koohiiStory2: Concentrated water is going to revolutionize the agriculture! Just add water... oh wait...
words: thick (as of color, liquid), dense, strong
